title: The Green Tea Room
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Take-out, Catering, Scottish, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Caters for special diets such as gluten free and vegan. Uses some organic, locally sourced & fair trade produce. Full menus for lunch & dinner. Previously on Chapel St in Moniaive, moved here Apr 2015. Seats 26 indoor, 30 outdoor. Evening reservation required.  Pet friendly.
